events.short:
9000 Savage Worlds: Tango at East Texas University, GM: Laura Hamel
            (Matinee Adventures), 6 players, No XP/Simple, Sunday 2p-6p. Midterms,
            hunting vamps, and clubbing at Raven's Loft. Sneak a few beers and ask
            the redhead to dance. What could go wrong? Adults Only (18+) $4.00
events.shorter:
9000 Savage Worlds: Tango at East Texas University,
            GM: Laura Hamel (Matinee Adventures), 6 players, No XP/Simple,
            Sunday 2p-6p. Adults Only (18+) $4.00
